category: Election Fair Committee Regulations/Article 14 (Advice on election complaints)
contents: Article 14 (Advice on election complaints) ① The election management committee of each local sports association and the election management committee of member sports organizations may, if necessary, request advice on authoritative interpretation from the election fair committee of the sports association before deliberation and resolution on election-related complaints. Revised 2020. 11. 05., 2022. 5. 10. ② The Fair Election Commission must respond within 10 days from the date of receiving a request for advice on the authoritative interpretation of paragraph 1 from the relevant organization. However, if related investigation and legal review are necessary, the processing period may be extended.
